description: LLDP MED port location (Either civic or elin address)
title: LldpMedPortLocation

uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

civic_address.description: Civic address to send out this port. User can remove this config by giving 'null' as an input for this parameter.

elin_address.description: ELIN address to send out this port. User can remove this config by giving 'null' as an input for this parameter.
